input.sentences: in this time of the season | most of nature 's colors are warm .
i found this lovely green flower next to my home .
there was also a very interesting flower i have never seen .
the butterflies were out tasting the buds .
i also saw this really large worm .
output.sentences: In a warm time of this season the tree trunks look marvelous.
Green plants make your home look lovely.
Grapes and flowers look especially wonderful in the garden.
It's nice to see how butterflies are tasting and fluttering around the buds and branches in the garden.
Worms are a great help to every gardener.
